entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 01:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 9 except temperature steady near plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low 9 except temperature steady near plus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
